meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent1: Jeepers! That was a big jump!
meanings.sent2: Oh jeepers, I can't believe I won!
meanings.sent3: Jeepers, that roller coaster was a wild ride!
meanings.sent4: Her sudden appearance made me jump, jeepers!
meanings.sent5: The fireworks lit up the sky, and everyone shouted jeepers in amazement.

meanings.definition: A euphemistic expression of surprise or annoyance.
meanings.sent1: My grandma always says jeepers when she's surprised.
meanings.sent2: The kids shouted jeepers when they saw the mess in the room.
meanings.sent3: Jeepers, I forgot my lunch at home again!
meanings.sent4: The news of the canceled event was met with a chorus of jeepers.
meanings.sent5: The sudden thunder made everyone in the room exclaim jeepers in unison.
